jobs.title: Mobile App Designer
jobs.description: We are looking for a talented Mobile App Designer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio, excellent visual design skills, and proficiency in design software.
requirements: Minimum 2 years of experience in mobile app design
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch
Understanding of iOS and Android design guidelines
Portfolio showcasing previous mobile design work

jobs.title: Flutter Developer
jobs.description: We're seeking a skilled Flutter Developer to help build cross-platform mobile applications. You'll work on exciting projects using the latest technologies and collaborate with a team of talented developers.
requirements: Experience with Flutter and Dart
Knowledge of state management solutions (BLoC, Provider, Redux)
Understanding of RESTful APIs and JSON parsing
Familiarity with version control systems like Git

jobs.title: UI/UX Researcher
jobs.description: Join our team as a UI/UX Researcher to help us understand user needs and behaviors. You'll conduct user interviews, usability testing, and translate research findings into actionable insights.
requirements: Background in psychology, human-computer interaction, or related field
Experience conducting user interviews and usability testing
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
Excellent communication and presentation abilities

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. You'll be responsible for implementing visual elements and creating responsive designs that deliver exceptional user experiences.
requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with modern frontend frameworks (React, Vue, Angular)
Knowledge of responsive design principles
Understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues

jobs.title: Mobile QA Tester
jobs.description: We're looking for a detail-oriented Mobile QA Tester to ensure our applications meet the highest quality standards. You'll design test cases, execute tests, and document bugs to help deliver flawless mobile experiences.
requirements: Experience in mobile application testing (iOS and Android)
Knowledge of testing methodologies and best practices
Familiarity with test management and bug tracking tools
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: We're seeking an experienced Product Manager to lead our mobile app development efforts. You'll define product strategy, gather requirements, and work with cross-functional teams to deliver outstanding mobile experiences.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in product management for mobile applications
Strong understanding of mobile app development lifecycle
Excellent communication and leadership skills
Ability to translate business requirements into product features

jobs.title: Content Writer
jobs.description: Join our team as a Content Writer to create engaging, high-quality content for our mobile apps and websites. You'll work closely with designers and developers to ensure a cohesive user experience through compelling copy.
requirements: Excellent writing and editing skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English
Understanding of UX writing principles
Ability to adapt tone and style for different platforms
Experience writing for digital products is a plus

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: We're looking for a skilled Backend Developer to build robust APIs and server-side applications. You'll work with a variety of technologies to create scalable and efficient backend systems for our mobile applications.
requirements: Experience with Node.js, Python, or Java
Knowledge of database systems (SQL and NoSQL)
Understanding of RESTful API design principles
Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
